metadata.title: CVE-2016-3697 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libcontainer/user/user.go in runC before 0.1.0, as used in Docker before1.11.2, improperly treats a numeric UID as a potential username, whichallows local users to gain privileges via a numeric username in thepassword file in a container.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

runc - 1.0.0~rc2+docker1.12.6-0ubuntu1~16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: runc package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0~rc2+docker1.12.6-0ubuntu1~16.04.1').
